actions.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka or Chatkcha attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Gythka

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Chatkcha
